title: 服务器报错后崩溃 报错日志在贴内
author: xiangnian
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-3-29 18:06 编辑 

[18:26:46] [Server thread/ERROR]: Encountered an unexpected exception
net.minecraft.util.ReportedException: Ticking entity
